## Load the packages
```{r}
library("tidyverse")
library("palmerpenguins")
```

```{r}
penguins <- penguins
```

## Dimension of 'penguins'
```{r}
dim(penguins)
glimpse(penguins)
```

## Names of `penguins`
```{r}
names(penguins)
```

## Individuals
```{r}
table(penguins$island)
#table(penguins$bill_length_mm)
#anyNA(penguins)
```

## Mean body mass
```{r}
mean(penguins$body_mass_g, na.rm=T)
mean(penguins$island)
```
